name: A Drum Rock Hero
description:
There is no easier way to learn to play the drums and have fun at the same time.


There is no easier way to learn to play the drums and have fun at the same time. Learn basic drum techniques, rhythms and patterns. Go through the tutorial to learn which is which, then put your skills to the test with an easy to use drum kit. Has everything you need to learn to become a drummer!

Drum Rock Hero is a free application that simulates a real drum set on your mobile/tablet screen. To play it, just drumming your fingers on the pads of the drums and the sound is played simultaneously.

Features:

* Multitouch
* Realistic drum sounds
* Quality audio
* Includes bass, snare, tom, floor, cymbal, hi-hat, and ride
* Complete drum kit
* Works with all screen resolutions - Cell Phones and Tablets (HD Images)
* Free

Made for drummers, percussionists, professional musicians, amateurs or beginners!
